changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.protocol_action ( id bigserial NOT NULL, name character varying, protocol bigint NOT NULL, jar_entry bigint, static_method character varying, action integer NOT NULL, attribute bigint NOT NULL, numeric_value numeric, integer_value integer, boolean_value boolean, text_value character varying, timestamp_value timestamp, binary_value bytea, sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, notes character varying, research bigint, CONSTRAINT protocol_action_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT protocol_action_jar_entry_fkey FOREIGN KEY (jar_entry) REFERENCES sqlj.jar_entry (entryid) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_action_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_action_protocol_fkey FOREIGN KEY (protocol) REFERENCES ruleform.location (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_action_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_action_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT protocol_action_sequence_number_check CHECK (sequence_number > 0) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
